name: New Year Simulator 2kxx
description:
Development:
It was developed using the Godot Engine.

Controls:
[W] [A] [S] [D] = Movement
[↑] [←] [↓] [→] = Movement
[Esc] = Quit to title

If you like this game, please consider donating & supporting!
All funds will be used for further development and updates.
